factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT 
    product_key,
    product_id, 
    product_name, 
    category_id, 
    launch_date, 
    price 
FROM golden.dim_product',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT 
    store_key,
    store_id, 
    store_name, 
    city, 
    country, 
    opened_date
FROM golden.dim_store',

launch_date_clean = coalesce(     toDate(toString(launch_date), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),     toDate(toString(launch_date), 'dd/MM/yyyy'),     toDate(toString(launch_date), 'MMM dd yyyy'),     toDate(toString(launch_date), 'MMMM dd yyyy') )) ~> derivedColumn1
launch_date_std = toString(     coalesce(         toDate(launch_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),         toDate(launch_date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),         toDate(launch_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy')     ) )) ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn4 derive(is_active = iif(isNull(opened), false(), true())) ~> derivedColumn5
select1 derive(store_name = iif(store_id == 'ST-9', 'Apple Park Visitor Center', store_name),
derivedColumn1 derive(repair_status = case(   status_raw == 'PENDNG', 'Pending',   status_raw == 'REJECTED', 'Rejected',   initCap(status_raw) )) ~> derivedColumn2

derivedColumn2 derive(claim_date_std = coalesce(   toDate(replace(claim_date, '/', '-'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),   toDate(replace(claim_date, '/', '-'), 'dd-MM-yyyy'),   toDate(replace(claim_date, '-', '/'), 'yyyy/MM/dd') )) ~> derivedColumn3

scripts.text:
-- 1. LIMPIEZA DE DIMENSIONES (Truncate)
TRUNCATE TABLE golden.dim_product;
TRUNCATE TABLE golden.dim_store;

-- 2. CARGA DE DIMENSIÓN PRODUCTOS (Denormalizada)
INSERT INTO golden.dim_product (product_id, product_name, category_id, category_name, launch_date, price)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    p.product_id,
    p.product_name,
    p.category_id,
    ISNULL(c.category_name, 'Sin Categoría') AS category_name,
    p.launch_date,
    p.price
FROM silver.products p
LEFT JOIN silver.category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id;

-- 3. CARGA DE DIMENSIÓN TIENDAS
INSERT INTO golden.dim_store (store_id, store_name, city, country, opened_date)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    store_id,
    store_name,
    city,
    country,
    opened_date
FROM silver.stores;
